TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Larry_Bergh, title = Larry_Bergh, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Bergh} }

S.FORM: Larry Bergh sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1945, ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 4, Larry Bergh, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Larry Bergh sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1945, ryax sa tay 2 nqo tay 4, Larry Bergh, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
